no.nordicsemi.android.blinky.profile

Interface BleManagerCallbacks

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlinkyManagerCallbacks
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BleProfileService, BlinkyService

    public interface BleManagerCallbacks

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBatteryValueReceived(int value)
      Called when battery value has been received from the device.
      void onBonded()
      Called when the device has been successfully bonded.
      void onBondingRequired()
      Called when an BluetoothGatt.GATT_INSUFFICIENT_AUTHENTICATION error occurred and the device bond state is NOT_BONDED
      void onDeviceConnected()
      Called when the device has been connected.
      void onDeviceDisconnected()
      Called when the device has disconnected (when the callback returned BluetoothGattCallback.onConnectionStateChange(BluetoothGatt, int, int) with state DISCONNECTED.
      void onDeviceDisconnecting()
      Called when user initialized disconnection.
      void onDeviceNotSupported()
      Called when service discovery has finished but the main services were not found on the device.
      void onDeviceReady()
      Method called when all initialization requests has been completed.
      void onError(java.lang.String message, int errorCode)
      Called when a BLE error has occurred
      void onLinklossOccur()
      This callback is invoked when the Ble Manager lost connection to a device that has been connected with autoConnect option.
      void onServicesDiscovered(boolean optionalServicesFound)
      Called when service discovery has finished and primary services has been found.

    • Method Detail

      • onDeviceConnected

        void onDeviceConnected()
        Called when the device has been connected. This does not mean that the application may start communication. A service discovery will be handled automatically after this call. Service discovery may ends up with calling onServicesDiscovered(boolean) or onDeviceNotSupported() if required services have not been found.

      • onDeviceDisconnecting

        void onDeviceDisconnecting()
        Called when user initialized disconnection.

      • onDeviceDisconnected

        void onDeviceDisconnected()
        Called when the device has disconnected (when the callback returned BluetoothGattCallback.onConnectionStateChange(BluetoothGatt, int, int) with state DISCONNECTED.

      • onLinklossOccur

        void onLinklossOccur()
        This callback is invoked when the Ble Manager lost connection to a device that has been connected with autoConnect option. Otherwise a onDeviceDisconnected() method will be called on such event.

      • onServicesDiscovered

        void onServicesDiscovered(boolean optionalServicesFound)
        Called when service discovery has finished and primary services has been found. The device is ready to operate. This method is not called if the primary, mandatory services were not found during service discovery. For example in the Blood Pressure Monitor, a Blood Pressure service is a primary service and Intermediate Cuff Pressure service is a optional secondary service. Existence of battery service is not notified by this call.
        Parameters:
        optionalServicesFound - if true the secondary services were also found on the device.

      • onDeviceReady

        void onDeviceReady()
        Method called when all initialization requests has been completed.

      • onBatteryValueReceived

        void onBatteryValueReceived(int value)
        Called when battery value has been received from the device.
        Parameters:
        value - the battery value in percent

      • onBondingRequired

        void onBondingRequired()
        Called when an BluetoothGatt.GATT_INSUFFICIENT_AUTHENTICATION error occurred and the device bond state is NOT_BONDED

      • onBonded

        void onBonded()
        Called when the device has been successfully bonded.

      • onError

        void onError(java.lang.String message,
             int errorCode)
        Called when a BLE error has occurred
        Parameters:
        message - the error message
        errorCode - the error code

      • onDeviceNotSupported

        void onDeviceNotSupported()
        Called when service discovery has finished but the main services were not found on the device.
